feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-09-25T13:56:16.454931Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;显示 HN：电子墨水日时间表</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/davidhampgonsalves/life-dashboard</id>; <更新>;2023-09- 25T12:54:41.517554Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/davidhampgonsalves/life-dashboard"/>; <作者>; <name>;dh-g</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dh-g</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/davidhampgonsalves/life-dashboard /master/example.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：279px；" />;<br />;二手 Kindle 可以改造成具有大型电子墨水屏幕、wifi 连接和 ARM 处理器的黑客平台。该项目的仪表板使用 FBInk 显示从 API Gateway/Lambda 后端获取的图像，提供了一种低摩擦方式来更新 API 逻辑，而无需接触 Kindle 或交叉编译任何内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-e-ink-day-schedule" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37642671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：带有波形发生器的在线示波器</stitle>; <id>;https://csurgay.com/syggen/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T12 :54:41.520439Z</updated>; <link href="https://csurgay.com/syggen/"/>; <作者>; <name>;csurgay</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=csurgay</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-online-oscillscope-with-waveform-生成器" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37622512" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们开始在 ChatGPT 中推出新的语音和图像功能</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt-can-now-see-hear-and-speak</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T12:54:41.521918Z</更新>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt-can-now-see-hear-and-speak"/>; <作者>; <name>;ladino</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ladino</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.openai.com/blob/9c95036b-c2f5-4af8- a9c4-ed6c411f77e4/chatgpt-can-now-see-hear-and-speak-alt.jpg?trim=0%2C0%2C0%2C0&width=1000&quality=80" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;ChatGPT 正在引入新的语音和图像功能，允许用户进行语音对话并向 ChatGPT 显示图像。这些新功能提供了更直观的与 ChatGPT 交互的方式，并且可用于各种目的例如讨论地标、分析图像以及帮助解决数学问题等任务。语音功能将在 iOS 和 Android 上提供，而图像功能将在所有平台上提供。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#we-are-beginning-to-roll-out-new-voice-and-image-capability-in-chatgpt" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37642335" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚马逊将向 Anthropic 投资高达 40 亿美元</stitle>; <id>;https://www.anthropic.com/index/anthropic-amazon</id>; <updated >;2023-09-25T07:54:41.522576Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.anthropic.com/index/anthropic-amazon"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jedwhite</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jedwhite</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://efficient-manatee.transforms.svdcdn。 com/product/images/amazonAnthropic_Blog_V1_2023-09-23-001347_uaqw.png?w=5760&h=3240&auto=compress%2Cformat&fit=crop&dm=1695428028&s=bac73482d5670a2c92fd2efa597678d8" style="width: 220 像素； height: 124px;" />;<br />;作为合作开发可靠且高性能基础模型的一部分，亚马逊将向 Anthropic 投资高达 40 亿美元。AWS 客户将可以通过 Amazon Web Services 访问 Anthropic 安全且可操控的 AI . <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amazon-will-invest-up-to-4b-in-anthropic" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37640466" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;异步 Rust 的状态</stitle>; <id>;https://corrode.dev/blog/async/</id>; <更新>;2023 -09-25T05:54:41.523320Z</更新>; <link href="https://corrode.dev/blog/async/"/>; <作者>; <name>;RebootStr</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RebootStr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://corrode.dev/blog/async/async-std-github .svg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 134px;" />;<br />;异步 Rust 生态系统的当前状态有些矛盾。仍然需要针对单独的运行时编写库，这将生态系统打造成孤岛。关于异步 Rust 的文档感觉已经过时或不完整。Tokio 是规范的异步运行时，但它对异步代码应该如何编写以及在哪里运行做出了假设。像 async-std 和 smol 这样的替代运行时探索了异步 Rust 的不同路径。对于某些用例，线程可以是异步 Rust 的更简单的替代方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-state-of-async-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37639896" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;婴儿潮一代正以大萧条以来从未见过的速度无家可归</stitle>; <id>;https://moneywise.com/news/economy/rate-of-homeless-婴儿潮一代增加</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T10:54:41.526666Z</更新>; <link href="https://moneywise.com/news/economy/rate-of-homeless-baby -boomers-increasing"/>; <作者>; <名称>;myshpa</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=myshpa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#baby-boomers-are-becoming-homeless-at-a-rate-not-seen-since-the-great-depression" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37641471" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 反垄断审判分析</stitle>; <id>;https://www .thebignewsletter.com/p/how-to-hide-a-2-trillion-antitrust</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T09:54:41.527333Z</更新>; <link href="https:// www.thebignewsletter.com/p/how-to-hide-a-2-trillion-antitrust"/>; <author>; <name>;passwordoops</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=passwordoops</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/ https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F31f1b899-9d71-4056-8194-c6826c5671b3_980x727.png" style="width: 220px; height: 164px;" />;<br />;谷歌反垄断审判涉及一家价值 2 万亿美元的强大公司，该审判基本上对公众保密。法官阿米特·梅塔 (Amit Mehta) 禁止公众参与审判，导致与 1998 年的 Microsoft 反垄断审判相比，报道和兴趣有限。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-analysis-of-the-google-antitrust-Trial" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37641393" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Netflix 准备发送最后的红包</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes .com/2023/09/23/business/media/netflix-dvds.html</id>; <更新>;2023-09-24T23:54:41.528755Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.netflix-dvds.html" nytimes.com/2023/09/23/business/media/netflix-dvds.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;marban</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= marban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/09/23/multimedia/23Netflix-DVDs-01-ltfz/ 23Netflix-DVDs-01-ltfz-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;曾经每周处理 120 万张 DVD 的 Netflix 的 DVD 发行工厂即将关闭。该公司的流媒体业务和原创内容制作已经改变了娱乐行业。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#netflix-prepares-to-send-its-final-red-envelope" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37632096" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;制作食物模型的过程。日本73岁工匠[视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jkrNMKz9pWU</id>; <更新>;2023-09-24T13:54:41.531433Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jkrNMKz9pWU"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rrampage</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rrampage </uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>;<iframe src =“//www.youtube.com/embed/jkrNMKz9pWU”frameborder =“0”allowfullscreenloading =“lazy”>;</iframe>; < a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-hacker-s-guide-to-language-models-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37631089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bitwarden：免费的开源密码管理器</stitle>; <id>;https://bitwarden.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-09 -25T08:54:41.532113Z</updated>; <link href="https://bitwarden.com/"/>; <作者>; <name>;punnerud</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=punnerud</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bitwarden.com/_gatsby/image/ca2b609b9ec14d07da43621491fc261a/cd7cebb888cc75726753bc66755f6e3e/homepage-hero-2.png ?eu=89da50b4b69bf881076ef4823e23683be53b50a9f80234853867e0ad1bac98862cf5195d269d7fb17e6d59dcd6e811bb31c37b371aed85dac9ee1cf6ea3dae5a51d2 59e761e7720f032ec7afe3f3001161c6480df58acd08a5697681b1e2b07410554e7ea17bee86bff86636e3807b37eab4ac762186eb3bea0d410d964926a927a5c39a6 54fad8de55bacf8b0fc4dd29ba573540681f2632a2a0b1847ec4dc4a5d35c105a41015b7689dd079668c2fe7c5f3f3c5e5902f1613cd95dad3f3597b7fda259d07d7be0ac9 a3622d796a8d4bc4efe2c69bf907afcc26a2d5b10f446efe366f5cc245859&a=w%3D200%26h%3D124%26fm%3Dpng%26q%3D75&cd=2023-08-16T22%3A27%3A54.858 Z"样式="宽度：220px； height: 137px;" />;<br />;Bitwarden 可以轻松保护您的所有密码和敏感信息，让您增强隐私并提高在线工作效率。Bitwarden Send 功能允许用户安全地向他人传输数据，同时保持端到端的安全性-结束加密安全性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bitwarden-free-open-source-password-manager" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37640816" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fantilator 页面</stitle>; <id>;https://onlyfans.web.cern.ch/</id>; <更新>;2023-09 -25T10:54:41.532788Z</updated>; <link href="https://onlyfans.web.cern.ch/"/>; <author>; <name>;edent</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=edent</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://onlyfans.web.cern.ch/static/2018_07_30.jpg" 样式=“宽度：220px； height: 165px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了将多个风扇连接在一起以创建更大装置的想法。它描述了风扇矩阵的不同设计和尺寸，以及电源的添加。文章还提到了对粉丝群候选人的考虑以及使用扎带来固定装置。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-fantilator-page" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37641706" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么我们需要模块？(2011)</stitle>; <id>;http:// erlang.org/pipermail/erlang-questions/2011-May/058768.html</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T02:54:41.533469Z</更新>; <link href="http://erlang.org /pipermail/erlang-questions/2011-May/058768.html"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;作者提出了一种不同的编程方式，取消模块并将所有函数存储在全局键值数据库中。他讨论了模块的优缺点，并建议所有函数都应该有唯一的名称，并与元数据一起存储在数据库中。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-do-we-need-modules-at-all-2011" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37638894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;选择 Postgres 队列技术</stitle>; <id>;https://adriano.fyi/posts/2023-09-24-choose-postgres-queue-技术/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-24T20:54:41.534798Z</更新>; <link href="https://adriano.fyi/posts/2023-09-24-choose-postgres-queue-技术/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bo0tzz </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bo0tzz</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>; <img src="https://adriano.fyi/img/choose_boring_tech_cost2.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;由于对可扩展性的痴迷，Postgres 队列技术经常被忽视。然而，一些公司认识到操作简单性的价值，并选择 Postgres 来满足其排队需求。 Postgres 提供发布/订阅和互斥功能，使其成为资源高效的队列处理选项。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#choose-postgres-queue-technology" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37636841" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Flameshow：终端火焰图查看器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/laixintao/flameshow</id>; <updated>;2023-09-25T04:54:41.535457Z </更新>; <link href="https://github.com/laixintao/flameshow"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/laixintao/flameshow/main/docs/flameshow.gif" style="width: 220 像素；高度：122 像素；" />;<br />;终端火焰图查看器。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户来为laixintao/flameshow 开发做出贡献。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#flameshow-a-terminal-flamegraph-viewer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37639702" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;根据新州法律，纽约雇主必须在招聘广告中包含工资</stitle>; <id>;https://english.elpais.com/economy-and-business/2023- 09-17/new-york-employers-must-include-pay-rates-in-job-ads-under-new-state-law.html</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T10:54:41.536137Z </更新>; <link href="https://english.elpais.com/economy-and-business/2023-09-17/new-york-employers-must-include-pay-rates-in-job-ads -under-new-state-law.html"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.english.elpais.com/resizer/5CwkyQOiu_8qO_rDp1ztne35qio=/414x0/cloudfront-eu-central-1.images.arcpublishing.com/prisa/UH577WTRZRHEDHA34GJ3IVBGH4。 jpg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;周日全州薪资透明度法生效后，纽约的招聘广告将必须披露拟议的薪资水平。拥有至少四名员工的雇主将被要求披露薪资范围对于外部或内部广告的任何职位。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-york-employers-must-include-pay-rates-in-job-ads-under-new-state- law" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37641583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;双塔嵌入模型</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.hopsworks.ai/dictionary/two-tower-embedding-model</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T01:54:41.536801Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.hopsworks.ai/dictionary/two-tower-embedding-model</id>; <更新>;2023-09-25T01:54:41.536801Z</更新>; hopsworks.ai/dictionary/two-tower-embedding-model"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jamesblonde</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jamesblonde</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.website-files.com/618399cd49d125734c8dec95/650ff449db8fd48fc72908ed_82HZeHGX7BzcfkMhQDQUb8LkQiHuarnBLsdiZunevY8CVy5gXIqNJBxxCWuxr5 tKWSIIq9KI1fJEwn-AroBQeYdoKONFSpDskzUhP1PYWlgKk595ggWZztCo3vNWc-7P0R5CMM8tH-TyTArMNGkU21U.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;双塔嵌入模型是一种通过将两种不同模态放置在同一向量空间中来连接两种不同模态嵌入的模型训练方法。它常用于个性化推荐系统。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#two-tower-embedding-model" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37631225" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;OpenStreetMap.org 上有新的地图样式</stitle>; <id>;https://en.osm.town/@openstreetmap/111120663721969898</id>; <updated>;2023-09-24T19： 54:41.537466Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.osm.town/@openstreetmap/111120663721969898"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.54:41.537466Z</updated>; ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.masto.host/enosmtown/media_attachments/files/111/120/ 641/540/173/957/original/67e575312802ac02.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 122px;" />;<br />;OpenStreetMap.org 上有一个新的地图样式！@tracestrack 的 Tracestrack Topo 地图是 osm-carto 和 OpenTopoMap 的混合体。它有许多改进，包括更多标签支持、CJK 字体、以及更好的国际化。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#there-sa-new-map-style-on-openstreetmap-org" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37636551" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;剪辑室地板</stitle>; <id>;https://tcrf.net/The_Cutting_Room_Floor</id>; <更新>;2023- 09-24T22:54:41.538109Z</updated>; <link href="https://tcrf.net/The_Cutting_Room_Floor"/>; <作者>; <name>;herbertl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=herbertl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tcrf.net/images/thumb/2/28/GTAIII-armour_prerelease.jpg /155px-GTAIII-armour_prerelease.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 154px;" />;<br />;The Cutting Room Floor 是一个致力于挖掘和研究视频游戏中未使用和已剪辑内容的网站。它提供有关调试菜单、未使用的音乐、图形、敌人、关卡等的信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-cutting-room-floor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=37637921" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;Grml.org 20 年</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.grml.org/archives/411-20-years-of-grml.org.html</id >; <更新>;2023-09-25T04:54:41.538753Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.grml.org/archives/411-20-years-of-grml.org.html"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;pabs3</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://blog.grml.org/uploads/grml_20th_birthday.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 305px;" />;<br />;哇，时间过得真快！20 年前，Mika 注册了 grml.org，并于 2004 年发布了第一个公开的 Grml。🥳 我们很高兴能有如此精彩的作品社区，并在我们的 Grml 每日 ISO 中用一个小复活节彩蛋来庆祝这一点！😜 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#20-years-of-grml-org" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37639590" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;移动设备上的文本编辑：看不见的问题</stitle>; <id>;https://jenson.org /text/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-24T13:54:41.539400Z</更新>; <link href="https://jenson.org/text/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kaftan- permans</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaftan-permans</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// jenson.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/image.png" style="width: 220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;手机上的文本编辑不行。实际上比你想象的要糟糕得多，一个没人欣赏的隐形问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #text-editing-on-mobile-the-invisible-problem" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37630804" 目标="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
